caption:
Table 6: Results on privacy-related regulation set-
ting evaluated on iWildCam and FMoW using Mo-
bileNet V2. Without privacy considered in the 
design, prior methods can only exploit public data 
and thus achieve far worse performance.

both meta-learned aggregator and student model

Table 11: Comparison using ID test split in iWildCam. The ID test split contains images from the 
same domains as the training set but on different days from the training images. The model trained 
without masks performs better than the model trained with masks under the ID test split but has lower
